metadata.name: AMURDAD OF PERSIA
metadata.description:
WAS AND IS AND WILL BE...
"Amurdad" has two parts "A" and "Murdad". "A" in Avestan language is  mean "No" and "UN" and "Murdad" mean "death and nothingness", 
so "Amurdad"; It is No Diyng or immortality.

In the official calendar of Iran, the name of this month is taken from the name of the fifth month of the New Avestan calendar.

This Music Made On Two Main Persian Folk Instrument ''Setar'' And ''DAF'' and The Main Structure Came From My Meditation About History Of Persia and Zarathustra.

[All My Artworks Will Be Derived From MY Meditation And My Mental Focus of Divine Creation]
